Source Block:
end

assign pack_wr = ivalid_d & |in_use_nx[SH_W-O_W:0];

generate
  if (O_REG) begin : o_reg

    always @(posedge clk) begin
      if (reset) begin
        ovalid <= 1'b0;
      end else begin
        ovalid <= pack_wr;
      end
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
      odata <= idata_packed;
    end

  end else begin

    always @(*) begin
      ovalid = pack_wr;
      odata = idata_packed;
    end

  end
endgenerate

endmodule
